mapper.insert:
SELECT S_T_UDMP_BATCH_TASK_PARAM.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO T_UDMP_BATCH_TASK_PARAM( INSERT_TIME, TASK_PARAM_ID, UPDATE_TIME, TASK_ID, PARAM_ORDER, IS_ARRAY, IS_DELETED, INSERT_TIMESTAMP, TASK_PARAM_NAME,TASK_PARAM_CODE, UPDATE_BY, TASK_PARAM_DATA_TYPE, VER, UPDATE_TIMESTAMP, PARAM_ID, IS_MANU, INSERT_BY, IS_REQUIRED ) VALUES ( SYSDATE, #{task_param_id, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , SYSDATE , #{task_id, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , #{param_order, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , #{is_array, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{is_deleted, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{task_param_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{task_param_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{update_by, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , #{task_param_data_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{ver, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{param_id, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , #{is_manu, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{insert_by, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , #{is_required, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select:
SELECT A.TASK_PARAM_ID, A.TASK_ID, A.PARAM_ORDER, A.IS_ARRAY, A.IS_DELETED, A.TASK_PARAM_NAME,A.TASK_PARAM_CODE, A.TASK_PARAM_DATA_TYPE, A.VER, A.PARAM_ID, A.IS_MANU, A.IS_REQUIRED FROM T_UDMP_BATCH_TASK_PARAM A WHERE 1 = 1
ORDER BY A.TASK_PARAM_ID

SELECT A.TASK_PARAM_ID, A.TASK_ID, A.PARAM_ORDER, A.IS_ARRAY, A.IS_DELETED, A.TASK_PARAM_NAME,A.TASK_PARAM_CODE, A.TASK_PARAM_DATA_TYPE, A.VER, A.PARAM_ID, A.IS_MANU, A.IS_REQUIRED FROM T_UDMP_BATCH_TASK_PARAM A WHERE ROWNUM <= 1000
ORDER BY A.TASK_PARAM_ID

SELECT A.TASK_PARAM_ID, A.TASK_ID, A.PARAM_ORDER, A.IS_ARRAY, A.IS_DELETED, A.TASK_PARAM_NAME,A.TASK_PARAM_CODE, A.TASK_PARAM_DATA_TYPE, A.VER, A.PARAM_ID, A.IS_MANU, A.IS_REQUIRED FROM T_UDMP_BATCH_TASK_PARAM A WHERE ROWNUM <= 1000
ORDER BY A.TASK_PARAM_ID
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_UDMP_BATCH_TASK_PARAM A WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT A.TASK_PARAM_ID, A.TASK_ID, A.PARAM_ORDER, A.IS_ARRAY, A.IS_DELETED, A.TASK_PARAM_NAME,A.TASK_PARAM_CODE, A.TASK_PARAM_DATA_TYPE, A.VER, A.PARAM_ID, A.IS_MANU, A.IS_REQUIRED FROM T_UDMP_BATCH_TASK_PARAM A WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY A.TASK_PARAM_ID

SELECT * FROM T_UDMP_BATCH_JOB_PARAM A LEFT JOIN T_UDMP_BATCH_TASK_PARAM B ON A.TASK_PARAM_ID = B.TASK_PARAM_ID LEFT JOIN T_UDMP_BATCH_PARAM C ON B.PARAM_ID=C.PARAM_ID WHERE JOB_ID = #{job_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
